data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick America.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
In Mexico City America attack through Sebastian Caceres. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 5, Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
America have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 9, Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in America territory.
Free kick for America in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 11, America are coming forward and Roger Martinez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Azteca.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a America throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tijuana de Caliente needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In Mexico City Tijuana de Caliente's Bryan Angulo is caught offside.
Free kick for America in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for America at Estadio Azteca.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 20, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to America.
Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for America in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 21, America have a dangerous throw-in.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
In the minute 25, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for America in Mexico City.
In the minute 27, Free kick for America in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
Miguel Barbieri is booked for the away team.
The match at Estadio Azteca has been interrupted briefly for a check on Sebastian Cordova, who is down injured.
Sebastian Cordova is back on his feet again.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Sebastian Caceres (America) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 31, Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of America.
In the minute 33, Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in America territory.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in America's half?
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 33, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Sebastian Cordova of America smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 36, Tijuana de Caliente's Bryan Colula has been booked in Mexico City.
In the minute 37, Goal! Richard Sanchez gives America a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Ruben Gonzalez to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 39, Clifford Aboagye (Tijuana de Caliente) has received a first yellow card.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in America's half.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Sebastian Cordova (America) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Azteca.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Pablo Guede (Tijuana de Caliente) is making a first substitution, with Aldo Cruz replacing Bryan Colula.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente's Clifford Aboagye gets in a shot but it is blocked by a America defender.
In the minute 49, America's Federico Vinas is on target but unsuccessful.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Important block from the Tijuana de Caliente defence as Sebastian Cordova fires in a strike for America.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of America.
America's Roger Martinez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards the home team a throw-in.
Roger Martinez for America gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a throw-in for America, close to Tijuana de Caliente's area.
America have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
In the minute 57, Goal! Bruno Valdez extends America's lead to 2-0.
Federico Vinas instrumental with a fine assist.
The away team replace Bryan Angulo with Mauro Lainez.
In the minute 59, America will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tijuana de Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente's Fabian Castillo breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 61, Clifford Aboagye (Tijuana de Caliente) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Edwin Cardona is replacing Kevin Balanta for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 63, Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tijuana de Caliente's half?
The home team have replaced Antonio Lopez Amenabar with Alonso Escoboza. This is the first substitution made today by Miguel Herrera.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 65, Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Azteca.
America's Roger Martinez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 66, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
America's Richard Sanchez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Azteca. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Free kick in a good position for Tijuana de Caliente!
In Mexico City Tijuana de Caliente attack through Clifford Aboagye. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 71, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
America to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to America just outside Tijuana de Caliente's area.
In the minute 74, Jaime Gomez (Tijuana de Caliente) gets a yellow card.
America drive upfield and Roger Martinez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tijuana de Caliente defender.
In the minute 77, America drives forward and Jorge Sanchez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in America's half.
Henry Martin is on a sub for Federico Vinas for America.
In the minute 78, Emilio Sanchez is replacing Sebastian Cordova for the home team.
America pushes forward through Roger Martinez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Great finish from Henry Martin to give America a 3-0 lead.
In the minute 80, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Free kick Tijuana de Caliente.
America have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Tijuana de Caliente make their fifth substitution with Jordi Cortizo replacing Fabian Castillo.
Pablo Guede is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Azteca with Edgar Lopez replacing Ariel Nahuelpan.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 84, It's now 4-0 in Mexico City as Henry Martin scores for America.
Alonso Escoboza with an assist there.
In Mexico City Tijuana de Caliente drive forward through Jordi Cortizo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 86, America needs to be cautious. Tijuana de Caliente have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 87, Free kick America.
America make their fourth substitution with Paul Aguilar replacing Roger Martinez.
At Estadio Azteca, Miller Bolanos has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Emilio Sanchez gets his shot on target but fails to score for America.
In the minute 89, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
The match has come to a close in Mexico City. The final score is 4-0.
